data.introduce: 航线信息查询接口（AirRout）主要用于航线信息查询，支持查询国家间、城市间航线，以及单点城市直飞航线查询。对应黑屏指令YY。
data.business: 该接口主要用于航线信息查询，支持查询国家间、城市间航线，以及单点城市直飞航线查询。支持国内、国际。
data.functions:
1、支持国家间的航线查询，即2个国家间直飞的城市查询。
2、支持城市间的航线查询，即2个城市间直飞的航空公司和有中转点的航线。
3、支持单点城市直飞航线查询，即所有和所查城市有直飞航线的城市。
4、暂不支持国家间指定航司查询，如指令YY：CNUS/CA
5、暂不支持指定国家查询直飞城市，如指令YY:SHA/US
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirRoutRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirRoutInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"DepCountry","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"起飞国家代码：如：CN","children":[]},{"name":"DepLoc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起飞机场/城市的三字代：如：SHA","children":[]},{"name":"ArrCountry","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"到达国家代码：如US","children":[]},{"name":"ArrLoc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场/城市的三字代：如：PEK","children":[]},{"name":"ConnNum","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中转点个数：补充中转点个数限制","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码：如：CA","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirRoutType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询类型。如：
QueryRoutByCityPair(查询城市/机场之间直飞的航空公司)
QueryRoutByCityPairTransit（查询城市/机场之间的中转联程路径）
QueryRoutByCity（查询从某城市/机场起飞或者到达的直飞航班）
QueryRoutByCountryPair（查询国家间直飞的航线和航空公司）","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirRoutRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"QueryRoutByCityResponse","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"从某城市/机场起飞或者到达的直飞航班","children":[{"name":"StatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态码","children":[]},{"name":"StatusInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态信息","children":[]},{"name":"VCountryAirports","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"直飞可以到达或起飞的机场","children":[{"name":"CountryAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"strCountry","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"直飞航班相关国家代码","children":[]},{"name":"vCitys","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"vCity","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机场/城市的三字代码","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"QueryRoutByCityPairResponse","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"城市/机场之间直飞的航空公司","children":[{"name":"StatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态码","children":[]},{"name":"StatusInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态信息","children":[]},{"name":"VOrgnames","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"VOrgname","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司列表","children":[]}]},{"name":"VRouteCityPairs","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"VRouteCityPair","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转路径","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"QueryRoutByCityPairTransitResponse","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"城市/机场之间的中转联程路径","children":[{"name":"StatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态码","children":[]},{"name":"StatusInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态信息","children":[]},{"name":"VOrgnames","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"VOrgname","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司列表","children":[]}]},{"name":"VRouteCityPairs","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"VRouteCityPair","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转路径","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"QueryRoutByCountryPairResponse","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"国家间直飞的航线和航空公司","children":[{"name":"StatusCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态码","children":[]},{"name":"StatusInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态信息","children":[]},{"name":"RoutingInfo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"行程信息","children":[]},{"name":"VRouteCityPairs","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"AirlinePath","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"strAirline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"vCityPairs","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"vCityPair","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" format of xml string is not valid ","msgZh":" xml内容格式错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirRoutRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <AirRoutInfo>
        <!-- 起飞国家代码 -->
        <DepCountry>CN</DepCountry>
        <!-- 起飞机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <DepLoc>PEK</DepLoc>
        <!-- 到达国家代码 -->
        <ArrCountry>CN</ArrCountry>
        <!-- 到达机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <ArrLoc>YYZ</ArrLoc>
        <!-- 中转点个数 -->
        <ConnNum>2</ConnNum>
        <!-- 航空公司代码,属性Code存值 -->
        <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
    </AirRoutInfo>
    <AirRoutType Type="QueryRoutByCity"/>
</TES_AirRoutRQ>

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirRoutRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <AirRoutInfo>
        <!-- 起飞国家代码 -->
        <DepCountry>CN</DepCountry>
        <!-- 起飞机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <DepLoc>PEK</DepLoc>
        <!-- 到达国家代码 -->
        <ArrCountry>CN</ArrCountry>
        <!-- 到达机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <ArrLoc>YYZ</ArrLoc>
        <!-- 中转点个数 -->
        <ConnNum>2</ConnNum>
        <!-- 航空公司代码,属性Code存值 -->
        <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
    </AirRoutInfo>
    <AirRoutType Type="QueryRoutByCityPair"/>
</TES_AirRoutRQ>

<TES_AirRoutRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <AirRoutInfo>
        <!-- 起飞国家代码 -->
        <DepCountry>CN</DepCountry>
        <!-- 起飞机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <DepLoc>PEK</DepLoc>
        <!-- 到达国家代码 -->
        <ArrCountry>CN</ArrCountry>
        <!-- 到达机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <ArrLoc>YYZ</ArrLoc>
        <!-- 中转点个数 -->
        <ConnNum>2</ConnNum>
        <!-- 航空公司代码,属性Code存值 -->
        <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
    </AirRoutInfo>
    <AirRoutType Type="QueryRoutByCityPairTransit"/>
</TES_AirRoutRQ>

<TES_AirRoutRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <AirRoutInfo>
        <!-- 起飞国家代码 -->
        <DepCountry>CN</DepCountry>
        <!-- 起飞机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <DepLoc>PEK</DepLoc>
        <!-- 到达国家代码 -->
        <ArrCountry>US</ArrCountry>
        <!-- 到达机场/城市的三字代码 -->
        <ArrLoc>YYZ</ArrLoc>
        <!-- 中转点个数 -->
        <ConnNum>2</ConnNum>
        <!-- 航空公司代码,属性Code存值 -->
        <AirlineCode>CA</AirlineCode>
    </AirRoutInfo>
    <AirRoutType Type="QueryRoutByCountryPair"/>
</TES_AirRoutRQ>
